nodes.text:
Morda was a planet and the homeworld of the Morling species.
It's land surfaces were covered by dense and dark forests. The light from the distant, orange star of the system couldn't always pierce through the thick clouds.
Since its discovery, Morda became a recurrent problem for the Galactic Empire, which launched unsuccessful pacification missions against the Morlings.
Morda was briefly mentioned by Jean-Michel Ringuet as the Morlings homeworld for the ambiguously canon roleplaying help "Providence" which appeared in the French magazine Avalon 1.
